Paper.Title: Corporate Language Resources in Multilingual Content Creation, Maintenance and Leverage

Section.Paragraph: This paper focuses on how language resources (LR) for translation (hence LR4Trans) feature, and should ideally feature, within a corporate workflow of multilingual content development. The envisaged scenario will be that of a content management system that acknowledges the value of LR4Trans in the organisation as a key component and corporate knowledge resource.
